intro: Desmochaeta orbiculata, commonly known as the orbiculate desmochaeta, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its rounded, orbicular leaves and small, daisy-like yellow flowers. Native to South America, particularly Brazil, it thrives in moist, shaded environments. The plant has a compact growth habit and is often found in forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural studies.
